channel.title: Lightwave 3D
channel.description:
I've never worked with this useless junk before considering I'm a Max modeller, but I have an .lwo scene which consists of ~100 objects that I need to export as one .obj so I can open that in 3ds Max. The problem is if I open the scene I can't export it as .obj, and if I open the modeler I can only export one object at a time. :meh:
Any way to just export the whole damn scene as a single .obj? Thanks..
